exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.description: A resistance machine exercise targeting the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Lunges
exercises.description: An exercise that targets the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes, performed by stepping forward with one leg and lowering the body until both knees are bent at a 90-degree angle.

exercises.name: Shoulder Press
exercises.description: An exercise targeting the deltoid muscles, performed by pressing a weight overhead from shoulder height to full extension.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.description: An isometric exercise that strengthens the core muscles, performed by holding a position similar to a push-up but with the forearms on the ground.

exercises.name: Bent Over Row
exercises.description: An exercise targeting the upper back and lats, performed by bending forward at the hips and pulling a weight towards the chest.

exercises.name: Lateral Raise
exercises.description: An isolation exercise targeting the deltoid muscles, performed by raising the arms laterally to shoulder height.

exercises.name: Deadlift
exercises.description: A compound exercise that targets the lower back, hamstrings, and glutes by lifting a weighted barbell or dumbbells from the ground to a standing position.

exercises.name: Romanian Deadlift
exercises.description: An exercise that targets the hamstrings and lower back, performed by hinging at the hips while keeping the legs straight and lowering a barbell towards the ground.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
exercises.description: An exercise targeting the deltoid muscles, performed by pressing dumbbells overhead from shoulder height to full extension.

exercises.name: Russian Twist
exercises.description: An exercise targeting the obliques and core muscles, performed by rotating the torso from side to side while holding a weight.

exercises.name: Chest Press
exercises.description: A compound exercise that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps, performed by pressing a weight upwards from a supine position.

exercises.name: Cable Row
exercises.description: An exercise targeting the upper back and lats, performed by pulling a cable attachment towards the torso while seated.
